sentences.en: Both of them, I may say, are thoroughly reliable men.
sentences.cn: 可以说，他俩都是绝对可靠的人。

sentences.en: Cleanse your face thoroughly and pin back your hair.
sentences.cn: 把脸彻底洗干净，再把头发往后别起。

sentences.en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup.
sentences.cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

sentences.en: Firm more soil over the roots and water thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 在根上再多培些土，用水浇透。

sentences.en: Food that is being offered hot must be reheated thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 买来的热熟食必须重新热透。

sentences.en: I've gotten my feet thoroughly soaked and feel frozen through and through.
sentences.cn: 我双脚湿透，感觉都冻到骨头里了。

sentences.en: Jean was thoroughly cheesed off by the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 琼对整件事情彻底绝望了。

sentences.en: Make sure that your tiles are thoroughly grouted and sealed.
sentences.cn: 要确保这些瓷砖经过彻底灌浆并且密封好。

sentences.en: Paul is a thoroughly likeable man with an unerring sense of comedy.
sentences.cn: 保罗十分讨人喜欢，开玩笑时很有分寸。

sentences.en: Sue is a thoroughly precocious little madam if ever there was one.
sentences.cn: 休确实是个少见的早熟的小丫头。

sentences.en: The room had been thoroughly cleaned.
The whole issue was thoroughly aired at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 在会上完全公开了整个问题。

sentences.en: Unload everything from the boat and clean it thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 把所有东西从船上卸下来，然后把船彻底清理一下。

sentences.en: Wash your face thoroughly with a mild soap and warm water.
sentences.cn: 用刺激性不强的肥皂和热水把脸彻底洗干净。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: With a thick mist now blanketing the trees, I got thoroughly lost.
sentences.cn: 此时浓雾笼罩着林木，我彻底迷路了。

trans.tran_cn: 彻底地，认真仔细地，完全地，非常
trans.tran_en: carefully, so that nothing is forgotten
